name: setup-job-workspacce-action
description: A action create workspace to checkout repository for each jobs

scripts.package: ncc build --source-map -o dist/main src/main.ts && ncc build --source-map -o dist/post src/post.ts
scripts.package:commit: npm run package && git add -u dist && git commit -m 'npm run package'
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
